name: Addict
flavor_text: Many homeless addicts roam the ghettos. They are easily provoked - some by words, some by expensive looking chrome alone.
itemize:skills: Chemistry Untrained,Commerce Untrained,Deceive Known,Dodge Known,Quaffing Untrained,Two melee combat trainings Known
weapons: a cheap conceilable or improvised weapon

name: Body Guard
flavor_text: Trained and equipped, these are not people generally assaulted intentionally - and for good reason. There are a lot of records of body guards overstepping their boundaries and almost as many of them getting away.
itemize:skills: Athletics Known,Dodge Trained,Interrogation Known,Intimidation Known,Medication Known,Perception Known,Security Known,One Melee Combat Training Trained,One Ranged Combat Training Known
weapons: any pistol or short rifle,a conceilable melee weapon

name: Bouncer
flavor_text: The people tasked with protecting clubs are recruited from places best kept secret, barely anyone is the high society they are protecting. That makes them rough, tough and easily manipulable.
itemize:skills: Dodge Trained,Interrogation Known,Intimidation Trained,Medication Known,Perception Known,One Melee Combat Training Trained,One Ranged Combat Training Known
weapons: a pistol,stun stick,knife

name: Laborer
flavor_text: The average Joe. Tough, bored and not particularily brilliant.
itemize:skills: any 5 Known
weapons: improvised

name: Gang Boss
flavor_text: A leader without much education but with comparatively much money, allowing decent equipment and some chrome.
armor: Civilian PES, Armored Suit or Flak Vest
itemize:skills: Appeal Trained,Command Trained,Commerce Untrained,Intimidation Trained,Philosophy Untrained,Restraint Trained,Any two Combat Trainings Trained
weapons: a conceilable ranged weapon,a conceilable or ornate melee weapon

name: Gang Mob
flavor_text: Gang members without meaningful education, physical prowess or even particular loyalty. What they lack in qualification though, they make up for in numbers. Approach with caution.
itemize:skills: Intimidation Trained,Philosophy Untrained,Restraint Known,Any two Combat Trainings Trained
weapons: a cheap weapon

name: Headhunter
flavor_text: Armed with quality guns and trained in their use, these guns for hire are a force to be reckoned with. They often have to hide their identities as to not be apprehended by officials or other headhunters.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Climbing Known,Deceive Known,Dodge Trained,Interrogation Known,Medication Known,Perception Trained,Restraint Known,Security Known,Stealth Trained,Survival Known,Any three Combat Trainings Trained
itemize:traits: DRUGGED,3 MT or RI worth of augs
weapons: a long range weapon,a conceilable ranged and melee weapon

name: Modded Goon
flavor_text: Loyalty is easily paid for in augments for these people. The weak ones die doing their job, the successful ones die from overexerting their bodies' Rayleigh Index.
itemize:skills: Intimidation Trained,Philosophy Untrained,Restraint Known,Any two Combat Trainings Trained
itemize:traits: 2 MT or RI worth of augs
weapons: improvised or shoddy weapon

name: Brawler Platform
flavor_text: Legion platform created for melee combat. Since it gets so close to enemies, it carries much less combat data but becomes very deadly in packs.
itemize:skills: Athletics Experienced,Climbing Trained,Cryptography Trained,Dodge Experienced,Logic Mastered,Perception Experienced,Security Experienced,One Armed Melee Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
weapons: simple long hilt,mono blade,ripper field generator that is always active

name: Enforcer Platform
flavor_text: The core of Legion's roster. Very durable, accurate and intelligent machines, vaguely resembling human anatomy. A sight to behold... and get away from asap.
itemize:skills: Athletics Experienced,Climbing Trained,Cryptography Trained,Dodge Experienced,Logic Mastered,Perception Trained,Security Experienced,Long Rifle Combat Training Experienced,Short Rifle Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
weapons: laser battle rifle OR,FG-9 OR,mass driver shotgun

name: Heavy Platform
flavor_text: The heaviest Legion platform ever recorded. It resembles a giant, four-legged bug with two arms carrying massive firearms. Barely anyone has ever lived to tell the tale though.
itemize:skills: Athletics Experienced,Cryptography Trained,Logic Mastered,Perception Experienced,Security Experienced,Launcher Combat Training Experienced,Heavy Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
weapons: Two of: hell hammer OR Model 6 Gladiator OR railgun OR ball lightning cannon,Mech-sized mono blades

name: Node Platform
flavor_text: A support unit improving processing capabilities and unit cohesion of all Legion platforms in the area.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Climbing Trained,Cryptography Mastered,Dodge Trained,Logic Mastered,Perception Experienced,Security Experienced,Short Rifle Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
weapons: laser smg conversion

name: Scout Platform
flavor_text: A small, lightweight recon platform with extremely fine sensors and jammers making it very hard to be detected itself.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Climbing Trained,Cryptography Known,Dodge Trained,Logic Mastered,Perception Experienced,Security Trained,Stealth Experienced,Long Rifle Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
itemize:traits: LEGION, DEADLY MELEE,all Outstanding and Trained Senses
weapons: mass driver battle rifle

name: Stalker Platform
flavor_text: A lightweight, silent and deceptive platform that operates well on its own. It features photoreactive panels as well, obscuring its position to the eye.
itemize:skills: Athletics Experienced,Climbing Experienced,Cryptography Experienced,Dodge Experienced,Logic Mastered,Perception Experienced,Security Experienced,Stealth Experienced,Long Rifle Combat Training Experienced,Pistol Combat Training Experienced,Striking Combat Training Experienced,Grappling Combat Training Experienced
weapons: mass driver sniper,high power rail pistol

name: Bhearno
flavor_text: -rhino and bear, huge, slow, strong, thicc skin, mostly moves in straight lines

name: Curtle
flavor_text: -cat and turtle, is cat with big bone plates on back, scratches still ouchie, more armor, less hair

name: Dravo
flavor_text: -dogo and raven, not very strong but might be annoying cause agile due to wings

name: Fromodo
flavor_text: -frogfish and komodo dragon, can live on land and in water, thicc skin, lures prey into dark alleys and then goes bitey bitey

name: Checkpoint Guard
flavor_text: Trained, equipped and motivated. They do an important job in checking supplies going in and out their areas, stopping illegal goods and migration.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Command Known,Dodge Known,Interrogation Trained,Medication Known,Perception Trained,Restraint Known,Security Trained,Long Rifle Combat Training Trained,Any two Combat Trainings Trained
weapons: AR-22,M10,baton,cuffs

name: Checkpoint Officer
flavor_text: More experienced and better equipped than the rest of their squad. Extremely cautious and well versed in reading people.
itemize:skills: Appeal Known,Athletics Trained,Command Trained,Dodge Known,Interrogation Trained,Medication Known,Perception Trained,Restraint Known,Security Trained,Long Rifle Combat Training Trained,Any two Combat Trainings Trained
weapons: AR-22,high-cal semi,baton,cuffs

name: Mercenary Antiarmor
flavor_text: A specialist at destroying very hard targets. Tanks or buildings are prime targets but some are rumored to have taken down Strike Team members as well.
itemize:skills: Athletics Known,Chemistry Untrained,Command Known,Dodge Known,Estimate Known,Perception Known,Restraint Known,Security Experienced,Survival Known,Heavy or Launcher Training Experienced,One Melee Combat Training Known
weapons: Mag Rail Cannon or RPEG,Combat Knife

name: Mercenary Commander
flavor_text: A more qualified mob boss that knows how to keep his men under arms loyal. Well equipped, charismatic and extensively trained in tactics, usually specialized in some area.
itemize:skills: Appeal Known,Athletics Known,Command Experienced,Dodge Known,Perception Known,Restraint Trained,Security Trained,Survival Known,Long Rifle Combat Training Trained,Pistol Combat Training Trained,One Melee Combat Training Trained
weapons: AR-22 with AP ammunition,M10 with JHP ammunition,a one-handed melee backup weapon

name: Mercenary Communicator
flavor_text: A specialist in information and communication technology. Usually every fireteam, at least every squad, has one.
itemize:skills: Appeal Trained,Athletics Known,Command Trained,Computer Operation Experienced,Dodge Known,Perception Trained,Restraint Trained,Security Known,Survival Known,Pistol Combat Training Trained,One Melee Combat Training Trained
weapons: Low power railpistol

name: Mercenary CQC
flavor_text: Close quarters fighters are very important in the close confines of bunker or lab complexes or ghettos. They are very sought after but usually lack expertise in tactics for pure weapon handling skills.
itemize:skills: Athletics Known,Command Known,Dodge Trained,Perception Trained,Restraint Trained,Security Trained,Stealth Known,Survival Known,Short Rifle Combat Training Trained,Two Melee Combat Trainings Trained
weapons: sawed-off shotgun OR,short-barrel rifle OR,smg,any melee weapon

name: Mercenary Firesupport
flavor_text: Sometimes heavier armament is required. In cases like this leaders are glad to look at one or two firesupport specialists, experienced in the use of heavy fast firing weapons.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Command Known,Dodge Trained,Perception Trained,Restraint Trained,Security Trained,Survival Known,Heavy Combat Training Trained,Long Rifle Combat Training Trained,One Melee Combat Training Trained
weapons: mass driver mmg OR,M2 Brass Storm

name: Mercenary Marksman
flavor_text: Taking out specific targets requires well-trained individuals with a very particular skillset. Recon falls onto these specialists as well, as recognizing details is a part of their job anyways.
itemize:skills: Athletics Known,Climbing Trained,Command Known,Dodge Known,Perception Experienced,Restraint Trained,Security Known,Stealth Known,Survival Known,Long Rifle Combat Training Trained,Pistol Combat Training Trained,One Melee Combat Training Trained
weapons: ballistic sniper,low-cal semi

name: Mercenary Medic
flavor_text: For most people putting holes in people is much more unlikely than patching them up. Those who make it their job are expensive and loved by all of their companions.
itemize:skills: Athletics Known,Command Known,Dodge Trained,Medication Trained,Perception Trained,Restraint Trained,Security Trained,Stealth Known,Survival Known,Pistol or Short Rifle Combat Training Trained,One Melee Combat Training Known
weapons: low-cal semi OR,ballistic smg,various medical equipment

name: Mercenary Pointman
flavor_text: The heart and soul of any fireteam. Trained to be versatile and flexible they are capable of answering to almost any call.
itemize:skills: Athletics Trained,Command Known,Dodge Trained,Perception Experienced,Restraint Trained,Security Known,Stealth Known,Survival Known,Two Ranged Combat Trainings Trained,Two Melee Combat Training Trained
weapons: AR-22 OR,short barrel rifle OR,ballistic shotgun,combat knife

name: Birb
flavor_text: A small, flying biped. Absolutely harmless.

name: Hunting Eagle
flavor_text: An expensive hunting animal. Eagles don't particularily like the cities, so it's very hard to keep them tame.

name: Stray
flavor_text: Wild dogs, stray cats and whatever other forsaken pets may roam the streets. They aren't generally a threat.

name: War Dog
flavor_text: Very loyal and well-trained dogs to search, fight and take down enemies. Since it takes so long to grow and train them, they are incredibly expensive.

name: Mutadog
flavor_text: A biological weapon created originally from a dog, hence the name. Not much of the original is left; mutadogs sport incredibly dense muscle fibers, thick bone plating and very erratic behavior, making them incredibly dangerous.

name: Infector Worm
flavor_text: An arm sized worm made from leftover biomass given life to by the invasive fungus known as Cerberus. Mainly exists to infect other creatures through bites or through exploding into a massive cloud of spores.
itemize:traits: ANIMAL, CERBERUS, VOLATILE,movement speed of 1m/s,melee attacks ignore non-sealed armor,does not explode if set on fire
weapons: Bite (D5+2; 0 AP; Infection),Death explosion (D10+1; 1 AP; Blast; Spray; Smoke; Infection)

name: Infected Creature
flavor_text: A creature that has been recently infected by the Cerberus fungus. The body's capability is changed by roughly the same amount, making especially swarms of small pests incredibly dangerous.
itemize:traits: CERBERUS, MODIFIER,natural weapons gain Infection special rule

name: Malformed Creature
flavor_text: A creature whose body was torn and malformed by a very long lasting Cerberus infection. Their outward appearance alone is known to kill people from shock and their claws may be powerful enough to break through doors.
itemize:traits: CERBERUS, MODIFIER,natural weapons gain Infection special rule
weapons: a biological equivalent of any melee weapon

name: Infected Plant
flavor_text: If a plant gets infected, its expected lifetime is reduced to but a few more weeks. However during that time any part of the plant that is eaten will infect the creature.

name: Pure Infection Form
flavor_text: A large amount of biomass may be combined in Cerberus hives to create Pure Infectors. These behemoths are not only incredibly dangerous on their own but also incubate infection worms in a big sac on their back that can be released at will.
itemize:skills: Intimidate Mastered
itemize:traits: CERBERUS,if threatened, releases 2D10 infector worms,has three turns in combat
weapons: claws and tentacles (2D10, 8 AP, Rending)

name: Automated Defense System
flavor_text: An automated weapon system containing a weapon, a shield and a targeting system. Sometimes they are submersible or fitted with additional targeting upgrades.
itemize:traits: ANIMAL,creature feels no fear and does not bleed,AI has integrity 12 and firewall 5
weapons: any Long Rifle, Launcher or Heavy weapon
